title: How crypto raiders tortured B.C. family with waterboarding, sex assault, in $2M heist
description: A gang of home invaders conducted a cryptocurrency heist that saw them escape with more than $2 million worth of bitcoin.

title: Bitcoin Crashes 30% in 2025, Erasing $1 Trillion Amid Fed Policy Shift
description: In 2025, Bitcoin crashed nearly 30% from its $120,000 peak, erasing $1 trillion in market value amid aggressive margin trading and liquidations. The Federal Reserve's hawkish policy shift reduced rate-cut expectations, amplifying panic and sell-offs across cryptocurrencies. This deleveraging event highlights crypto's volatility, with recovery uncertain.

title: XRP Up 89% in One Year While Bitcoin Gains Just 3.6%: What’s Driving the Gap?
description: As of mid-November 2025, XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) is one of the only large-cap digital assets still showing strong gains over the last year. According to CoinGecko’s market data, XRP has gained about 89% over the past 365 days, while Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) has returned roughly 3.6%. The gap is striking, and it’s not random. The ...
